      • getVehicleBusinessResource

        @Path(value="/{id}/vehicles")
public VehicleBusinessResource getVehicleBusinessResource()
        This will get VehcileBusinessResource Object which can be accessed via UserBusinessResource and your path for all VehicleBusinessResources should have prefix of this function path
        Returns:
        VehicleBusinessResource Object
